comments.raw_text:
Update the SPOC schema to support a `sponsored_by_override` string that can be set within Adzerk.

Also ensure we've got the `sponsor` string field already in there, and if not, also add that.
comments.creator: sdowne@getpocket.com
comments.author: sdowne@getpocket.com

Update the SPOC schema to support a `sponsored_by_override` string that can be set within Adzerk.
